formElement.label: Service Name Override:
formElement.documentation: Name for the service in Docker. If no override value is specified here, the service name in CloudBees Flow will be used to name the Docker service.

formElement.label: Networks:
formElement.documentation: Comma separated (CSV) list of networks to create for application.For example, net1, net2

formElement.label: Subnets:
formElement.documentation: Comma separated (CSV) list of subnet IPs (in IP/netmask format, IP should not end with 0) for networks mentioned in 'Networks' field. Multiple subnets for same network must be separated by '|' (pipe). For example, 10.200.1.10/24|10.200.2.10/24, 192.168.10.10/24. To use default values for any network in list skip it using commas like ,,192.168.10.10/24

formElement.label: Gateways:
formElement.documentation: Comma separated (CSV) list of gateways for networks mentioned in 'Networks' field. Multiple gateways for same network must be separated by '|' (pipe). For example, 10.200.1.1|10.200.2.1, 192.168.10.1. To use default values for any network in list skip it using commas like ,,192.168.10.1
